name: Indian Treasure Virgin Hair - Natural Black 4oz
description:
Our Indian Treasure Pure Remi is the dream hair you've been looking for. This hair is double drawn meaning the hair is folded and sewn instead of being cut. This top of the line Indian Hair texture blends great with all ethnicity of natural hair. The hair can be washed, dyed, cut and curled and straightened back silky. Comes in two colors, natural black and natural brown.

Fast Processing. Only 3-5 Days Before Shipping

Caring For Your Hair

To care for this hair wash the hair gently in warm water with mild shampoo. Swish the hair gently in the water containing conditioner until it is clean and rinse with warm water. Comb the hair with a large tooth comb. Hair should be air dried for best results and never blow dried. Do not dry in the sun. With proper care, your virgin hair should last up to a year or possibly longer. It's highly recommended that you seal your wefts to protect your investment by adding longevity to your virgin hair.

name: Peruvian Mermaid Straight 3 Piece Bundle Deal
description:
Our Bundle Deals are the perfect solution to getting a full weave for a great price. Each deal include between 290-300grams of hair. Each bundle also includes different lengths so that you can achieve a very natural layered look. If you don't see the lengths that you would like to choose then please email roxivirginhair@gmail.com for a quote and a Paypal invoice. Our Peruvian Princess Straight is dead on BONE STRAIGHT. This hair is full from root to tip to give the effect of strong healthy hair. When it comes to high class looks, this hair beats out the rest and leave you standing on top of the style pyramid! Due to the hair being AAAA quality, this hair can be washed, dyed, cut and curled and straightened back silky.

Caring For Your Hair

To care for this hair wash the hair gently in warm water with mild shampoo. Swish the hair gently in the water containing conditioner until it is clean and rinse with warm water. Comb the hair with a large tooth comb. Hair should be air dried for best results and never blow dried. Do not dry in the sun. With proper care, your virgin hair should last up to a year or possibly longer. It's highly recommended that you seal your wefts to protect your investment by adding longevity to your virgin hair.

Our Satisfaction Guarantee

We are so confident that you'll love our hair so much that we provide a 7 day money back guarantee on your order. All we ask is that your hair is unused, uncut, unaltered in anyway and returned in all of it's original packaging.

Shipping & Handling

There is no charge to ship hair via USPS. Due to the large about of orders for our hair, we estimate that processing your order may take 4 -10 business days before being shipped. We believe that each clients order is important so we ship on a first come first serve basis. Once your order has been shipped, we will email you tracking information.

name: Brazilian Heat Virgin Straight (Relaxed)
description:
Our Brazilian Heat Virgin Straight Hair has a thick, beautiful and healthy texture that resembles the look of relaxed tresses. You are sure to love the natural look of this hair blending beautifully with your own. This hair is tangle free, shed free and the color is completely natural. You can also color the hair, wave and curl to turn up the heat every where you go!

name: Malaysian Persuasion Body Wave
description:
Our Malaysian Persuasion Body Wave Hair is great for creating a look with all natural volume. This hair is full from root to tip and is tangle free with minimal shedding. Multiple looks can be achieved with the hair such a teasing, waves, curls and even straighten. Each bundle of hair is between 95-100grams. Please remember that the true hair length is taken when the hair is stretched straight.

Caring For Your Hair

To care for this hair wash the hair gently in cool water with mild shampoo. Swish the hair gently in the water containing conditioner until it is clean and rinse. Apply a good quality leave in conditioner to the hair to assist with manageability. Blot out hair with a 100% cotton fabric (we suggest an old t-shirt instead of a towel to prevent frizz). Hair should be air dried for best results and never blow dried. Do not dry in the sun. With proper care, your virgin hair should last up to a year or possibly longer. It's highly recommended that you seal your wefts to protect your investment by adding longevity to your virgin hair.

Our Satisfaction Guarantee

We are so confident that you'll love our hair so much that we provide a 7 day money back guarantee on your order. Due to the large about of orders for our hair, we estimate that processing your order may take 4 -10 business days before being shipped. We believe that each clients order is important so we ship on a first come first serve basis. Once your order has been shipped, we will email you tracking information.

name: Peruvian Mermaid Wave
description:
Our Peruvian Mermaid Wave is guaranteed to give you the sultry siren like waves you desire. When you need to have the sexiest hair in the room, this is the product to turn to. This hair holds a very beautiful, long lasting curl and looks best when set with flexi rods. This Peruvian hair keeps it promise by being silky to the touch and incredibly soft.
